</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for intersection of terrain between two ASL positions. Same as [[terrainIntersectASL]], only returns intersect position instead of [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''terrainIntersectAtASL''' [pos1, pos2] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1, pos2]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionASL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionASL]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - intersect position in format [[PositionASL]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_posASL = [[terrainIntersectAtASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[getPosASL]] chopper];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
